bossDialog: (The lonely Toxdweller starts screaming and throwing rocks at you. The commotion attracts more creatures, and a brawl breaks out!)
I found this treasure first! Get your own, you greedy pig!
Wha- where did YOU come from?! Get out of my hideout! I'll kill you if I have to!

cardBonuses.2: Enemies take 25% more damage from their {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} debuffs.
cardBonuses.4: Increases the amount of {STAT_speed} added to the {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} debuffs your creatures apply by 25%.
cardBonuses.6: Enemies take 25% more damage from their {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} debuffs.

master.dialog: Toxdwellers really, really, REALLY enjoy bombs. And that's just fine with me, since bombs are great for winning battles. Let's fight - but I'm warning you, you might want to step back a bit or risk losing a limb!
master.name: Aener

name: Toxdweller
